column1: The expression patterns of the genes varied among different members. CsbHLH2, CsbHLH5, CsbHLH9, CsbHLH15, CsbHLH16, CsbHLH21, CsbHLH24, CsbHLH27, CsbHLH33, CsbHLH35, CsbHLH37, CsbHLH38, CsbHLH39, CsbHLH42, CsbHLH44, CsbHLH47, CsbHLH48, and CsbHLH54 were down - regulated by cold, while CsbHLH4, CsbHLH18, CsbHLH22, CsbHLH26, CsbHLH34, CsbHLH36, CsbHLH41, CsbHLH43, CsbHLH46, and CsbHLH49 showed increased expression levels during the cold treatments.
